description_localized.en:
1 Double Bed
161-sq-foot (15-sq-meter) room with city views

Internet - Free WiFi
Food & Drink - Room service and minibar
Bathroom - Private bathroom, a hair dryer, and a shower/tub combination
Practical - Safe, desk, and phone; cribs/infant beds available on request
Comfort - Air conditioning
Need to Know - No rollaway/extra beds available
Non-Smoking
